<a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36351065" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习</stitle>; <id>;https://security.googleblog.com/2023/ 06/learnings-from-kctf-vrps-42-linux.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:03:58.775961Z</更新>; <link href="https://security.googleblog.com /2023/06/learnings-from-kctf-vrps-42-linux.html"/>; <author>; <name>;tim_sw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tim_sw </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gstatic.com/images/branding/googlelogo/2x/googlelogo_color_150x54dp.png" style="width: 220px; height: 80px;" />;<br />;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#learnings-from-kctf-vrp-s- 42-linux-kernel-exploits-submissions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350693" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 正在删除版主通过将他们的社区私有化来抗议</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T04:03:58.778481Z </updated>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/"/>; <author>; <name>;Jimmc414</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Jimmc414</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://external-preview.redd.it/4QG8xCazO9IE7CYVQd7M4ICpETI2Xj_tbos4K5p6_8o.png?width= 1024&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c35722975acbc564f2f4d2bb802c3fe55dbf2ff5" style="width: 220px; height: 100px;" />;<br />;没有修改过的普通用户不知道需要什么，因此在很大程度上不知道它直接影响到他们或被他们看到。并非所有版主都是天使但总的来说，无论规模大小，那些创建了可持续、持久社区的人都在做正确的事情，而 Reddit 的整个用户群通常看不到和低估了长时间、几个月和几年的维护、照顾和喂养。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-is-removing-moderators-that-protest-by-taking-their-communities-private" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我 24 岁的 HP Jornada 可以做 iPhone 仍然做不到的事情</stitle>; <id>;https://raymii. org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jornada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T21:03:58.778906Z</更新>; <link href="https://raymii.org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jorn ada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do.html "/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raymii.org/s/inc/img/jornada-1.JPG" style="宽度: 220px; height: 175px;" />;<br />;1999 年发布的 HP Jornada 720 是一款运行 Windows CE 或 Linux 的小型掌上电脑。它有 C 和 C++ 编译器、Python 和 Perl，使其成为一个成熟的开发工作站。与现代 iPhone 不同，它允许您在设备上开发、编译和运行本机软件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-24-year-old-hp-jornada -can-do-things-an-iphone-still-can-t-do" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36346254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;软件工作量估算主要是虚假研究</stitle>; <id>;https://shape-of-code.com/2021/01/17/software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research/ </id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T23:03:58.779314Z</更新>; <link href="https://shape-of-code.com/2021/01/17/software-effort-estimation- is-mostly-fake-research/"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;工作量估算是任何项目、软件或其他项目的重要组成部分。然而，软件工程的研究人员在获取现实估计数据方面受到限制，导致使用了小而过时的数据集。机器学习技术在软件工程研究中已成为一种趋势，但研究人员通常依赖于 1980 年代至 90 年代的微小数据集，而不是利用更大、更相关的数据集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Squarespace 就收购 Google Domains 资产达成最终协议</stitle>; <id>;https://newsroom.squarespace.com/blog/googledomains</id>; <updated >;2023-06-16T01:03:58.779691Z</updated>; <link href="https://newsroom.squarespace.com/blog/googledomains"/>; <author>; <name>;cebert</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cebert</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/ 4f6792f624ac778428aca39d/1686760328191-5MB1X3TAPMB49D201Z4X/Domains_Hero_v2_1920x1062+%281%29+1+%282%29.png?format=1500w&content-type=image%2Fpng" style="width: 220 像素；高度：122 像素；" />;<br />;Squarespace 已达成最终协议，以收购与 Google Domains 业务相关的资产。此次购买包括大约 1000 万个托管在 Google Domains 上的域。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#squarespace-enters-definitive-agreement-to-acquire-google-domains-assets" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36349033" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;序列图，UML 给软件开发带来的唯一好处</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mermaidchart.com/blog/ posts/sequence-diagrams-the-good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T17:03:58.780069Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.mermaidchart.com/blog/posts/sequence-diagrams-the-good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development"/>; <author>; <name>;knsv</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=knsv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.mermaidchart.com/blog/posts/images/seq -simple.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;当您记录系统的不同部分以及这些部分相互交互的各种方式时，序列图真的很有用。序列图描述系统内的操作并映射发送消息的内容和时间。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sequence-diagrams-the-only-good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36342931" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Trsvid，TRS-80 模型 1、3 和 4 的视频播放器</stitle>; <id>;http://48k .ca/trsvid.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:03:58.780435Z</更新>; <link href="http://48k.ca/trsvid.html"/>; <作者>; < name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是一个 trsvid 的视频：什么您会看到每秒 60 帧的全屏视频。好吧，在 Model 4 上。Model III 的处理速度刚刚超过 54 帧/秒，而 Model I 的处理速度刚刚超过 51 帧/秒。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trsvid-a-video-player-for-trs-80-model-1-3-and-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Localrf – 来自休闲视频的 Nerf</stitle>; <id>;https://localrf.github.io/< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T00:03:58.781085Z</updated>; <link href="https://localrf.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;smusamashah</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smusamashah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我们在优化辐射场的同时逐步添加帧并估计它们的姿势。局部辐射场在整个过程中动态分配。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localrf-nerf-from-casual-shaky-videos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;暗黑破坏神宣传文档 (1994) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T00:03:58.781856Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;bpierre</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bpierre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#diablo -pitch-document-1994-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348356" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从开源中创收< /stitle>; <id>;https://vadimdemedes.com/posts/generating-income-from-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T01:03:58.782214Z</updated>; <link href= "https://vadimdemedes.com/posts/generating-income-from-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;farazzz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =farazzz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vadimdemedes.com/og/posts/generating-income-from-open-source.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 110px;" />;<br />;Ink 是一个开源项目，正在寻找产生收入和支持进一步发展的方法。个人捐赠是不够的，企业不太可能出于善意捐赠。开源项目应该根据他们为公司提供的价值收费。建立在开源基础上的成功企业使用不同的方法来产生收入，例如提供不同的许可证、分层定价计划或开源和付费版本的组合。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#generating-income-from-open-source" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36349208" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;二甲双胍显示可预防长期 Covid</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/covid-19/common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T03:03:58.782591Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/covid-19/common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid "/>; <author>; <name>;sp332</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sp332</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/sites/default/files/styles/article_detail/public/article/Older%20woman%20taking%20a%20white%20pill.jpg?itok=paYdNBhn" style="宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;既往感染与 COVID-19 检测呈阴性显着相关，而在柏林，私人住宿的感染率高于酒店住宿。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#metformin-shown-to-prevent-long-covid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36350280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Unison 语言和平台路线图</stitle>; <id>;https://www.unison-lang.org/roadmap/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T03:03:58.783354Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.unison-lang.org/roadmap/"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.unison-lang.org/assets/unison-social.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;看看我们现在兴奋和努力的是什么😎路线图当然不是我们努力的详尽清单，而且很可能会发生变化。<a href= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unison-language-and-platform-roadmap" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36333409" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;WinFsp · Windows 文件系统代理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T00:03:58.783757Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp"/>; <author>; <name>;mariuz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mariuz </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/winfsp/winfsp/master/art/winfsp-glow.png" style="宽度： 220像素； height: 220px;" />;<br />;WinFsp 使开发人员能够将自己的文件系统编写为 Windows 计算机上的用户模式程序。它为自定义文件系统提供开发和运行时支持，允许通过标准 Windows 文件 API 访问信息. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#winfsp-windows-file-system-proxy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36322233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Tilt Five – 将全息图带回家 – 玩您最喜欢的 3D 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tiltfive.com/</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-15T21:03:58.787633Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tiltfive.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;peter_d_sherman</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=peter_d_sherman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global-uploads.webflow.com/63dd894ba29fc70dd693813d/64505c64620a335a2386eb76_t5-product-4 -clipped-lo.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;制定战略、战斗和玩您最喜欢的视频游戏、棋盘游戏或桌面角色扮演游戏 — 现在，令人惊叹的 3D 图形与您周围的环境融为一体，就在您的桌子上。Tilt Five™是第一个也是唯一一个使用创新投影技术将您和您的朋友连接到您喜爱的游戏的增强现实 (AR) 系统 - 亲自或在线！立即购买 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#tilt-five-bring-holograms-home-play-your-favorite-games-in-3d" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36345851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;约 30 万年前纳勒迪人制作的岩石版画</stitle>; <id>;https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.06.01.543133v1</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T19:03:58.787989Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.06.01.543133v1"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tdaltonc< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tdaltonc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.biorxiv. org/sites/default/files/images/biorxiv_logo_homepage7-5-small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;在洞穴墙壁或其他表面上绘制、蚀刻或雕刻设计的生产被认为是人类进化中的一个主要认知步骤。最近的研究表明，其他人类群体也做出了这样的标记，包括尼安德特人和可能的直立人。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rock-engravings-made-by-homo-naledi-300k-years-ago" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36344397" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CUDA 加速光线追踪器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maxilevi/raytracer</id >; <updated>;2023-06-16T02:03:58.788335Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/maxilevi/raytracer"/>; <author>; <name>;maxilevi</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=maxilevi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maxilevi/raytracer /master/screenshots/free_france_alternative.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;这是一个用 C++ 从头开始​​编写的光线追踪器。它支持使用 C++ 11 线程和 CUDA 的 CPU 和 GPU 计算。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #cuda-accelerated-raytracer" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36349893" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;结识合适的人（2022 年） )</stitle>; <id>;https://notebook.drmaciver.com/posts/2022-06-05-14:53.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T17:03:58.789093Z</已更新>; <link href="https://notebook.drmaciver.com/posts/2022-06-05-14:53.html"/>; <author>; <name>;SenHeng</​​name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SenHeng</​​uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;在您缺乏专业知识的领域寻找优秀人才可能具有挑战性。简单地在线搜索可能不会产生最佳结果，因为优秀的专业人士通常不会做广告。关键是要认识可以提供推荐和联系的合适人选。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#getting-to-know-the-right-people-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36323888" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;大脑如何处理德语和阿拉伯语</stitle>; <id>;https://en.qantara.de/content/language-and-language-acquisition-how -the-brain-processes-german-and-arabic</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T22:03:58.789448Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.qantara.de/content/ language-and-language-acquisition-how-the-brain-processes-german-and-arabic"/>; <author>; <name>;kaycebasques</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=kaycebasques</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://en.qantara.de/sites/default/files/styles/slideshow_wide/public/uploads/2023- 05/230330_ig_sprachregionen-deutsch-arabisch_en_gross_0.png?itok=ozMb8Qjj" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;莱比锡马克斯普朗克人类认知和脑科学研究所的科学家进行的一项研究发现，以阿拉伯语和德语为母语的人在处理语言时有不同的大脑连接。以阿拉伯语为母语的人在大脑的左半球和右半球之间有更明显的联系，而以德语为母语的人在大脑的左半球有更强的联系。大脑连接的这些差异是由每种语言的结构和需求决定的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-the-brain-processes-german-and-arabic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36347222" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;UnsuckJS：使用轻量级 JavaScript 库逐步增强 HTML</stitle>; <id>;https://unsuckjs.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 15T18:03:58.790564Z</updated>; <link href="https://unsuckjs.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;vmoore</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=vmoore</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;VanJS 是一个轻量级的声明式 UI 框架，允许用户在短短一个小时内构建有用的 UI 应用程序。它提供自动依赖跟踪，无需样板代码、VDOM 或编译器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unsuckjs-progressively-enhance-html-with-lightweight-javascript-libraries" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36343544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在线图书页面</stitle>; <id>;https://onlinebooks.library.upenn.edu/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -15T23:03:58.791334Z</updated>; <link href="https://onlinebooks.library.upenn.edu/"/>; <author>; <name>;twobitshifter</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=twobitshifter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-online-books-page" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;4 位八位处理器 – AMI S2000 和 Iskra EMZ1001</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cpushack.com/2023/06/13/the-4-bit-eight-bit-processor-ami -s2000-and-iskra-emz1001/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T23:03:58.791711Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cpushack.com/2023/06/13 /the-4-bit-8-bit-processor-ami-s2000-and-iskra-emz1001/"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/用户？id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.cpushack.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/EMZ1001E_2-300x247。 jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 182px;" />;<br />;S2000/EMZ1001 处理器由卢布尔雅那大学电气工程学院与 Iskra 和 AMI 合作开发，是一款面向工业自动化的基础控制处理器。它具有4 位和 8 位总线，其核心是 8 位数据总线和 4 位 ALU。处理器有一个用于处理子程序和中断的堆栈，并包括用于内存存储的板载 ROM 和 RAM。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-4-bit-eight-bit-processor-ami-s2000-and-iskra-emz1001" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325774" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
